lofi.name: LoFi Radio
lofi.description: LoFi focus music for study, work, and relaxation

prompts.video: Create a tweet about this LoFi video: '{VIDEO_TITLE}'. Make it engaging for study/work focus. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.
prompts.general: Create a calming LoFi tweet about focus music, study vibes, or relaxation. Make it warm and inviting. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.

horoscope.name: Daily Horoscope
horoscope.description: Daily horoscope readings and spiritual guidance

prompts.daily: Create a daily horoscope tweet for {ZODIAC_SIGN}. Make it mystical, inspiring, and include a positive message for the day. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.

meditation.name: Meditation & Mindfulness
meditation.description: Meditation tips, mindfulness practices, and spiritual guidance

prompts.general: Create a peaceful meditation tweet about mindfulness, inner peace, or spiritual growth. Make it calming and inspiring. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.

fitness.name: Fitness & Wellness
fitness.description: Fitness tips, workout motivation, and health advice

prompts.general: Create an energetic fitness tweet about workouts, motivation, or health tips. Make it inspiring and actionable. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.

cooking.name: Cooking & Recipes
cooking.description: Cooking tips, recipes, and food inspiration

prompts.general: Create a warm cooking tweet about recipes, kitchen tips, or food inspiration. Make it inviting and appetizing. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.

Create an informative tech tweet about the latest technology news, AI developments, or innovation trends. Make it engaging and shareable. Include relevant hashtags and emojis. Keep it under 280 characters.
